{{Infobox album | Name = Akira Toriyama: The World | Type = [[Soundtrack]] | Artist = Various Artist | Cover = Akira Toriyama, The World Cover.PNG | Released = {{start date|1990|07|7}} (COCC-6460) | Recorded = | Genre = Anime | Language = [[Japanese Language|Japanese]] | Length = ??:?? | Label = Columbia Records | Producer = | Reviews = | Chronology = | Last album = | This album = | Next album = }} {{nihongo|'''''Akira Toriyama: The World'''''|鳥山明 ザ・ワールド|Toriyama Akira za Wārudo}} is an image soundtrack that not only features [[Dragon Ball Z]], but two other [[Akira Toriyama]] works, ''[[Pink (manga)|Pink]]'' and ''Kennosuke-sama''. It was released by [[Columbia Records]] on July 7, 1990. == Album Information == This album features vocal tracks from the films based on three Akira Toriyama properties featured at the 1990 ''Toei Anime Fair'' of the same name, which were ''[[Pink (manga)#Water Bandit Rain Bandit|Pink: Water Bandit, Rain Bandit]]'', ''Kennosuke-sama'', and the third ''Dragon Ball Z'' film ''Chikyū Marugoto Chōkessen'' which is known outside Japan as ''[[Dragon Ball Z: The Tree of Might]]''. Tracks 2-4 would go on to be included in fourth volume of the ''[[Dragon Ball Z: Complete Song Collection]]'', ''[[Dragon Ball Z Complete Song Collection 4: Promise of Eternity|Promise of Eternity]]'' and the ''[[Dragon Ball Z: CD-Box Super Complete Collection|Super Complete Collection]]''. == Track List == #[[Cha-La Head-Cha-La]] #プラス・アルファ（＋α）

This album focuses exclusively on the film "Pink: Water Bandit, Rain Bandit" which is a follow up the original 1982 short manga "The Rain Jack Story". The three songs from the previous album Pink's theme "Mizutama no Umbrella",and the two image songs "Otomeha Mystery" and "GO AHEAD!!" were ported to this album along with the film's score. === Track List === #Album Overture #Pink Music Part 1 (M1~4) #GO AHEAD!!
